name: PirataTron
description:
Pitch :

PirataTron is a coop-shooter inspired by the Pirataton mode of Sly Cooper's games. It focuses on cooperation actions.

===========================================================

Control :

-2  players and 2 Gamepad are required

-Left stick : move

-Right stick : shoot
